title: Unbearable lag in ranked solo queue
body: I lost three games in a row due to lag, I frequently dc'd throughout the game and had to reboot. The problem is most definitely not on my end at all in any way shape or form and I want to make that very clear. I would like an LP refund if possible I was demoted because of this, not cool.

replies.body: There must be an issue right now with league and certain ISPs. If it wasn't 6:30 AM EST I bet you this forum would be blowing up right now.
